name: Chordattraction
description: This simple puzzle game tries to make people remember the order of piano chords(I'm not people). There are only two levels, but I might add to them later. Also, the game takes too long to load for me. Still, I don't know if this is an issue with my project or if it's only because of my poor network connection(Unfortunately, I have to use a VPN to open itch io, and even without it, my internet is really slow), so I'd appreciate it if you let me know if this is an issue for you too or not.
